title: Retribution
description: Phil and Ben struggle through the chaos of the Galactus invasion and come to terms with what’s truly important to them in the face of complete annihilation. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich.
author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
